intro: I'm a software developer with a passion for web development. I am currently based somewhere in the world. My main focus is building fast, accessible, and beautiful websites that users enjoy.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: I am proficient in C, C++, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL.
I have experience with React, Angular, Node.js, Express.js, and Flask.
I am familiar with Git, Docker, and various CI/CD tools.
I have worked with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
